i1.name: Martial Cadence
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Jarvan IV's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|8% of the target's {{sti|'''current''' health}}}} as additional {{as|physical damage}}, with a minimum threshold of 20 and capped at 400 against all targets.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Jarvan IV's basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current health as additional physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 20 and capped at 400 against all targets.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Martial Cadence'' does not apply to [[structure]]s.
* ''Martial Cadence's'' damage is based on the current health of the target before any damage of the attack has been dealt.
* ''Martial Cadence's'' damage is dealt after the main attack damage.
** If the target dies to the main attack damage, the additional damage will not be dealt.

q1.name: Dragon Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' extends his lance in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reducing their armor}}}} for 3 seconds.

If the lance connects with a deployed {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}} (65 {{tip|gameplay radius}}), '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dashes}} to its location, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} nearby enemies around him along his path for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jarvan IV extends his lance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and reducing their armor for 3 seconds.
If the lance connects with a deployed Demacian Standard (65 gameplay radius), Jarvan IV dashes to its location, knocking up nearby enemies around him along his path for 0.75 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|90 to 250}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|10 to 26}}% of target's armor}}}}
q1.notes:
* The armor reduction is applied after the damage. The damage dealt does not benefit from it in this case.
* ''Dragon Strike's'' area of effect always extends from '''Jarvan IV's''' position after the cast time.
* ''Dragon Strike'' will still pull '''Jarvan IV''' to {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}} if he is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}} but he will remain as such when he reaches his destination (duration permitting).
* {{si|Flash}} will interrupt the {{tip|dash}} to a {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}} but '''Jarvan IV''' will still {{tip|airborne|knock up}} and damage enemies he comes in contact with at the new location.
** Casting ''Flash'' right before the ''dash'' begins will cause '''Jarvan IV''' to be pulled to the flag from the new position.
** Enemies already hit by ''Dragon Strike'' cannot be affected more than once.
* The {{tip|airborne|knockup}} also slightly moves the target, landing 50-100 units in a random direction.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Armor Reduction: % of target's armor

w1.name: Golden Aegis
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|slow|slows}} all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
'''Jarvan IV''' also {{tip|shields}} himself for 5 seconds, increased by {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% of his '''maximum''' health}} for each enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by ''Golden Aegis''.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jarvan IV slows all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
Jarvan IV also shields himself for 5 seconds, increased by 1.5% of his maximum health for each enemy champion hit by Golden Aegis.

e1.name: Demacian Standard
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area.

The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings and providing an [[aura]] that grants {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} equal to ''Demacian Standard's'' passive to '''Jarvan IV''' and all nearby allied champions.
''Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jarvan IV gains bonus attack speed.
Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.
The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting sight of its surroundings and providing an aura that grants bonus attack speed equal to Demacian Standard's passive to Jarvan IV and all nearby allied champions.
Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
e1.notes:
* The attack speed granted from a deployed ''Demacian Standard'' {{tip|stacks additively}} with ''Demacian Standard's'' passive permanent bonus attack speed to '''Jarvan''', but the aura from multiple ''Demacian Standards'' does not stack.
* The flag has {{fd|13.6}} {{tip|pathing radius}} and 65 {{tip|gameplay radius}}.
** The gameplay radius matters to {{ai|Dragon Strike|Jarvan IV}}.
* ''Demacian Standard'' can be targeted by allied abilities ({{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}). The target type is the same as a {{tip|minion}}.
* ''Demacian Standard'' is {{tip|untargetable}} to enemies.

r1.name: Cataclysm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target enemy champion's location over {{fd|0.35}} seconds and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies upon arrival.

Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain that initially pulls units inside it, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}. The terrain lasts for {{fd|3.5}} seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area. ''Cataclysm'' can be recast after 1 second.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Jarvan IV''' destroys the terrain created by ''Cataclysm''.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jarvan IV leaps with displacement immunity to the target enemy champion's location over 0.35 seconds and deals physical damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain that initially pulls units inside it, though not rendering them airborne. The terrain lasts for 3.5 seconds and grants sight of the area. Cataclysm can be recast after 1 second.
Recast: Jarvan IV destroys the terrain created by Cataclysm.
r1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation.
* ''Cataclysm'' will not deal damage, generate terrain, nor refund its cooldown if '''Jarvan IV''' is killed while {{tip|dash|leaping}}.
* The perimeter is made up of 24 units with 95 {{tip|pathing radius}}, 65 {{tip|gameplay radius}} and 1350 {{tip|sight}} radius each. Only every other unit is rendered visible.
* {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn}} will not destroy the whole ring but only the part that {{ci|Ornn}} collides with.
